nodes.text: This individual was a male Rutanian who lived on the planet Rutan. Sometime in 44 BBY, he served as a Security Police in the city of Testa. When the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn, his Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi, and the Senali Drenna, tried to get themselves arrested by illegally loitering on a park, this male police and his partner intervened. Tired, and anxious to go home, the two police officers gave them a warning instead. Qui-Gon then resorted to influencing the female police's mind with the Force, and planted the suggestion that the three of them needed to be arrested.
